description: Brighouse 22 - Move-in this now! Final 7 of 22 modern, spacious family friendly townhomes in the residential neighbourhood of Richmond-Brighouse ranging from 1,588 - 2,226 sq ft. Over height ceilings on the main level w/ floor to ceiling windows & full size S/S appliances by Bosch and Fisher & Paykel & wide plank laminate flooring throughout main. Dramatic peaked roofs w/ white & grey hardiplank exterior. Forced air heating & cooling system for year round comfort. Located in the heart of Richmond Centre - 10 min walking distance to Richmond Shopping Centre,Richmond Brighouse Skytrain Station, & Garden City Park. Schools: William Cook Elem, Richmond Secondary, & Kwantlen University. 1 pkg & locker included. Call for your private tour! OPEN HOUSE: SUN, JAN 4, 2-4 PM
